page.title: 02Social Concerns
page.content: {PROBLEM IN SOCIETY. The main problem today in our Society is{unemployment}in both young and old alike.The older people who have been employed and were made redundant or have left their jobs and now cannot get one,are those mostly,that are married with two or three children to support,and this causes alot of problems in families.The younger people who leave school and have no job to go to hang around in gangs or { {Vandalise}places because they have nothing better to do and often end up in prison.Another major problem of today is drugs,were apart from damaging their health and killing themselves most of them turn to stealing and mugging to get the money for drugs.....
